data.title: Kalos ilthe to dollario
data.text:
1967 Greek theatrical comedy film

Kalos ilthe ton dollario

Καλώς ήλθε το δολλάριοDirected byAlekos SakellariosWritten byAlekos SakellariosStarringGiorgos Konstadinou

Anna Kalouta

Sotiris MoustakasDistributed byAnzervos

Orwo Hellas

Release date

Running time

99 minutesCountryGreeceLanguageGreek

Kalos ilthe to dollario (Greek: Greek: Καλώς ήλθε το δολλάριο, Welcome, dollar) is a 1967 Greek comedy film directed by Alekos Sakellarios, based on the theatrical work The 6th American Fleet by Alekos Sakellarios and Christos Giannakiopoulos.

The film stars Giorgos Konstantinou, Anna Kalouta and Sotiris Moustakas. It was shown at the 1967 Thessaloniki Film Festival.

Giorgos Konstantinou - Filippos Angeloutsos

Anna Kalouta - Madame Fouli
